channel.title: Web on Fieryrival's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Web on Fieryrival's Blog

item.title: A Pilgrim's Progress: Exploiting ImageMagick and Binwalk on Pilgrimage
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox comprising of .git directory, magick binary for file read and binwalk for privilege escalation.

item.title: Beyond the Blog: Exploiting WordPress CVEs on HTB 'MetaTwo'
item.description: Write-up for ‘MetaTwo’, a box that involves exploiting WordPress CVEs with multiple vectors (SQLi, XXE, LFI) for foothold, and then leveraging passpie for root privilege escalation.

item.title: Forging the One Shell: A PDFKit RCE on HTB 'Precious'
item.description: Easy rated box from hackthebox comprising of a Ruby pdfkit RCE for foothold and a sudo misconfiguration for privilege escalation.

item.title: From Forged Requests to Pager Escapes on HTB 'Sau'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox comprising of an SSRF leading to RCE for foothold, and a systemctl less pager escape for privilege escalation.

item.title: Scoring with WebSockets: A Winning Goal on HTB 'Soccer'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox comprising sqli, tiny file manager rce and doas for privilege escalation.

item.title: The Path to Root: Hijacking the Search on HTB 'Busqueda'
item.description: Easy rated linux box ‘Busqueda’ from hackthebox comprising of command injection for foothold, credentials reuse for internal subdomain and insecure code executing a relative path script as root leading to privilege escalation.

item.title: Beyond the Interface: Escalating with a Bash Operator Flaw
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox with hidden directories leading to RCE for foothold, and bash operator evaluation for privilege escalation.

item.title: From Spring Boot LFI to Ansible Root: A Guide to HTB 'Inject'
item.description: Easy rated linux box from hackthebox with Springboot application for foothold and ansible for privilege escalation.
